description: Mobile techniques used by INSOMNIA, ATT&CK software S0463 v1.0
name: INSOMNIA (S0463)

techniques.comment: [INSOMNIA](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0463) communicates with the C2 server using HTTPS requests.(Citation: Volexity Insomnia)
[INSOMNIA](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0463) can extract the device’s keychain.(Citation: Google Project Zero Insomnia)

[INSOMNIA](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0463) can collect application database files, including Gmail, Hangouts, device photos, and container directories of third-party apps.(Citation: Google Project Zero Insomnia)
[INSOMNIA](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0463) has utilized malicious JavaScript and iframes to exploit WebKit running on vulnerable iOS 12 devices.(Citation: Volexity Insomnia)
[INSOMNIA](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0463) exploits a WebKit vulnerability to achieve root access on the device.(Citation: Volexity Insomnia)
[INSOMNIA](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0463) can track the device’s location.(Citation: Google Project Zero Insomnia)
[INSOMNIA](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0463) has communicated with the C2 using HTTPS requests over ports 43111, 43223, and 43773.(Citation: Volexity Insomnia)
[INSOMNIA](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0463) obfuscates various pieces of information within the application.(Citation: Volexity Insomnia)
[INSOMNIA](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0463) grants itself permissions by injecting its hash into the kernel’s trust cache.(Citation: Google Project Zero Insomnia)
[INSOMNIA](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0463) can retrieve the call history.(Citation: Google Project Zero Insomnia)
[INSOMNIA](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0463) can collect the device’s contact list.(Citation: Google Project Zero Insomnia)
[INSOMNIA](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0463) can retrieve SMS messages and iMessages.(Citation: Google Project Zero Insomnia)
[INSOMNIA](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0463) can obtain a list of installed non-Apple applications.(Citation: Google Project Zero Insomnia)
[INSOMNIA](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0463) can collect the device’s name, serial number, iOS version, total disk space, and free disk space.(Citation: Google Project Zero Insomnia)

[INSOMNIA](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0463) can collect the device’s phone number, ICCID, IMEI, and the currently active network interface (Wi-Fi or cellular).(Citation: Google Project Zero Insomnia)
